reviewText:
Actually not bad,but there was one problem from the beginning; no information about the content and i think the most important is to know wich movies are in this package. So of course,2 movies i had already. I think there should be more information about this kind of boxes,i meet the same problem with the mexican movie-packs.
So if you have already a lot of asian movies and don't want to risk to have movies double,you should check out first what's inside. My item is far away from here,so i'm sorry,for the moment i can not inform you about the movies inside,
